headline: A Rough Year, Eased by Her Own Writing
abstract: Ada Calhoun had a rough year. Fortunately, the process of writing her latest book prepared her for it.
lead_paragraph: Two years ago, a cri de coeur of an essay addressing why middle-aged women were overwhelmed and exhausted went viral. Its author, Ada Calhoun, ended up writing an entire book on the subject: “Why We Can’t Sleep: Women’s New Midlife Crisis" (out this month).
keywords: Why We Can't Sleep: Women's New Midlife Crisis (Book)
